name: The Hidden Treasure of Nahala: Lite
name_original: The Hidden Treasure of Nahala: Lite
description:
Think you can find the hidden objects in that mysterious house?
Play The Hidden Treasure of Nahala!

********************************************

A strange letter landed at your door, inviting you to a mysterious place where you will try to solve the riddle of "The Hidden Treasure of Nahala". A sun-shaped stone was attached to this letter, making things even more strange...
What is this place and who sent you that letter? Was it that weird couple you met on your trip last summer? They were very nice and really liked you, but there was something odd about them for sure...
The address that was written in that letter brought you to that mysterious house. Things seem to be unknown and unclear, only making you eager to reveal the secrets this place hides...

Are you clever enough to do so?

********************************************

"The Hidden Treasure of Nahala" includes:
- 3D animation
- Original soundtrack
- Puzzles and riddles to solve
- Mysterious environment
- and more...
